mapper.select: select EC.kh,C.km,EC.gh,EC.xq,EC.sksj from (select E.kh,E.gh,E.xq,O.sksj from Elective as E left join (select kh,gh,sksj from Open)as O on E.kh= O.kh and E.gh=O.gh where xh = #{xh} ) as EC left join (select kh,km from Course_) as C on EC.kh=C.kh
select * from Elective where xh = #{xh} and xq = #{xq} and kh=#{kh} and gh=#{gh}
mapper.insert: insert into Elective(xh,xq, kh, gh) values(#{xh},#{xq},#{kh},#{gh})
mapper.delete: delete from Elective where xh=#{xh} and xq=#{xq} and kh =#{kh} and gh=#{gh}
mapper.update: update Elective set pscj=#{pscj},kscj=#{kscj},zpcj=#{zpcj} where xh=#{xh} and kh=#{kh} and gh=#{gh} and xq=#{xq}
